name: Time Montage
description:
This a game about a time traveling and meet different historical people. Playing as Su, a young college girl, you will and different animals/pets in daily life and return them to the original owners who lived in various historical time period.

Genre：Board Game, TRPG

Platform: Mobile Game (IOS, Android)

Audience: Age 12-40 people who love historical anecdotes
